conversion_verification.notes: Successful isometric cutaway rendering with consistent geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth and wall thickness; clear interior volume representation.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout fidelity is high; correctly captures the WC, central utility block, and the unique bay window/window seat on the right side.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture and fixtures (sink, toilet, cabinets) are placed logically based on the plan, though some kitchen appliances are simplified.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean lighting and material usage; background is professional without text contamination.

detected_errors.description: Minor door swing directions and some small internal partition widths vary slightly from technical dimensions.

summary: A highly accurate and clean 3D isometric conversion that faithfully translates the architectural complexity of the original floor plan.
